discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The solution described does not fully meet the goal.

While highlighting the Washington Territory in the Map View of the Filter and Map View section allows you to view a geographical representation of resources in that territory, it does not filter the resources specifically on the schedule board itself.

To meet the goal, you would need to configure a filter on the schedule board to display only the resources assigned to the Washington Territory.

Thus, the correct answer is:
B. No
